reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress has a typical boho style and appreciate its lightweight fabric, making it suitable for various seasons including summer, fall, and spring. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, comfort, and color, with one customer noting it doesn't feel cheap at all. Regarding size, while some find it true to size, others mention it runs a bit large. The fabric quality receives mixed reviews,

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can dress up and down for whatever event you have going on!
items.body: Gorgeous, Comfortable & Perfect for Any Occasion! I was a little nervous ordering this dress online, but it completely exceeded my expectations! The lace embroidery and pocket is even prettier in person—it gives the dress such an elegant, feminine touch without feeling over the top. The adjustable straps are a huge plus because you can customize the fit to your body, and the pleated tiered design makes it flow beautifully when you walk. What I love most is how versatile it is. I’ve already worn it to a summer wedding with heels and a clutch, but it also works perfectly with sandals and a capped sleeve shirt for a more casual look. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, which makes it comfortable for all-day wear, yet it doesn’t feel cheap at all. Sizing was true to the chart, and the length is just right (I’m 5' 7" tall for reference, and it hits me right at the ankles). I’ve received so many compliments already! If you’re looking for a flattering, stylish maxi dress that you can dress up or down, this is definitely worth it. I’m already considering getting it in another color! Read more
items.author: Sam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 3 season dress!
items.body: Very comfortable. The boho style was perfect for a summer music festival and I this rust color will transition well into fall with some booties. Great for pear shaped bodies, as it is “flowy”, doesn’t cling to your curves. After washing, it held up so the quality is good. It runs big. I normally wear a medium or large in dresses so I ordered a medium first but it was too big. Small fits perfectly. (5’11, 170lbs for reference) Read more
items.author: RLB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute jumper.
items.body: It fits. Size small. 5’4” tall, 138 lbs. it is really full. And cute, but full. Made nicely. The over the shoulder straps are a contrasting embroidered look and very cute. I wore it with boots and was cute. Fabric is heavy and will be good to wear in the Fall and Winter. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flowy casual maxi boho beige overall dress
items.body: Super comfortable, cute, and casual overall dress. My go to outfit for vacation and parties. Roomy fit, beige color was thick enough not to be too sheer, had an elegant flow to have a feminine feel. Absolutely worth getting! Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, cute, a must have for the fall!
items.body: Super cute with a little sexiness, perfect for a night out. This has become one of my favorite things to wear because it’s so comfortable and cute. Length was great, material feels thick but still light weight. Love the designs on it. Read more
items.author: Corey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute for year around wear, trendy and stylish !
items.body: Such a cute trendy dress . It’s a comfortable oversized fit. The stripes are adorable with the detail. You can wear short sleeve, tank shirt in the summer or wear a long sleeve for when it is cold . Easy to style for year around. The only thing I wish it had was pockets . I love me some pockets ! Other than that … totally a good buy Read more
items.author: Shawna

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, heavy
items.body: It’s pretty but 1. Very heavy and 2. The inside liner is too small Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but was to big
items.body: Super cute, very light material. I ordered a medium (tag was not on product so that was weird) but it was to big for me. I generally wear an 8, every once in a while a 10. I am returning for a smaller size. Sure hope a small fits! Read more
items.author: Chicajul

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, White, Apricot, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
